o jogo e fantastico muito bom

My favorite FPS and maybe my favorite game of all time, period. This game is demanding in a way most games shy from; with an absurdly high skill ceiling but fair balancing. Any time you lose you always could have played better. Every gun takes hours to master, every map requires learning and memorization. It's hard to pick up but consistently and absurdly satisfying to improve in, even after 2000 hours. Just the way it rewards skill and knowledge and quick thinking puts this game in a class of it's own. It's not for everyone, but if it's for you, you'll find most any other fps to be too simple and easy after sinking time into this one.
